casebody.data:
State of TEXAS, plaintiff,
v.
State of NEW MEXICO and State of Colorado. No. 141, Original. Supreme Court of the United States Jan. 27, 2014.

Motion for leave to file a bill of complaint granted. Motion of plaintiff for leave to file a supplemental brief granted. New Mexico allowed 60 days within which to file a motion to dismiss, in the nature of a motion under Rule 12(b)(6), Federal Rules of Civil Procedure. Plaintiff allowed 45 days to file a response to the motion. A reply, if any, shall be filed within 15 days after the response is filed.
